description: FakeTV is a burglar deterrent that recreates the light of a real HDTV television.  So from outside, it looks just like someone is home watching TV.  Most burglars do not target occupied houses.  Why risk prison?  So when a prowler sees that flickering glow that means someone is home watching TV, he knows to move on to an easier target. So, FakeTV makes a break-in less likely.  Our new model FTV-11 is three times brighter than our model FTV-10.FakeTV's built-in computer controls 12 super-bright LEDs that fill a room with light.  It accurately simulates scene changes, fades, and on-screen motion, in thousand of possible shades of color, just like real TV.  A built-in light sensor turns FakeTV on at dusk, and it can be set to turn off after four or seven hours.  The dynamic light from FakeTV conveys the impression of "alive" in a way that a light on a timer cannot.  Consumes just the power of a night light.  AC Adapter included.
title: FakeTV FTV-11 Extra Bright Burglar Deterrent
